Moved to Houston in October 80Graduated Culinary Institute of America. Worked at Cellar in Sky World Trade Center, Sheraton Corporation, Junior League of Houston, Bon Appetite, Lakeside Country Club and Bay Oaks Country Club.Over Thirty years in Food Service13years as a Invited Employee.Team member Texas Chefs Association George W Bush Presidential inauguration reception, Economic Summit Rice University.Culinary Institute of America – Culinary Team Member25 years as a member Houston Livestock Show & Rodeo, Chairman 2 timeWife Tracy, son Gregory, Daughter ElizabethStarted at the Woodlands CC in February Contact Me Jesse Regalado Club Manager | Tournament Contact Me Jesse.Regalado Contact Me + Close Jesse Regalado information modal Jesse Regalado Club Manager | Tournament Serving since 2022 Jesse.Regalado Jesse.Regalado Contact Me Contact Me Amber Sickafoose Membership Director Contact Me 281-845-4886 Amber.Sickafoose Contact Me About Amber + Close Amber Sickafoose information modal Amber Sickafoose Membership Director Serving since 2010 281-845-4886 Amber.Sickafoose 281-845-4886 Amber.Sickafoose Contact Me About Amber Amber holds a BS degree in Marketing from Bellevue University. She started her career as a Director of Marketing for a financial company but quickly decided that sales was her real passion. Her golf career began in 2009 for The Woodlands Country Club as a membership director for both The Oaks and Panther Trail courses as well as The Woodlands Country Club courses. She is a very active member in the community and a graduate of Leadership Montgomery County class of 2013. Contact Me Jason Lippy Membership Director Contact Me 832-810-5876 Jason.Lippy Contact Me About Jason + Close Jason Lippy information modal Jason Lippy Membership Director Serving since 2015 832-810-5876 Jason.Lippy 832-810-5876 Jason.Lippy Contact Me About Jason Jason comes to Indian Wells Country Club by way of Desert Falls Country Club in Palm Desert, where he spent the four years as General Manager / Membership Director. Before moving to California in 2015, Jason spent the previous 12 years working as General Manager / Membership Director for Glen Oaks Country Club, a Invited Affiliate Club in Louisville, Kentucky. 

Jason has worked in the golf business his entire career, starting in the Golf Shop at The Polo Fields Country Club when he was only 16.  He then moved to Glenmary Country Club to join the Membership Sales Department. Eventually becoming Club Manager at Glenmary Country Club.  Jason is a graduate of Western Kentucky University’s Broadcasting Department and has also worked covering college basketball and football for ESPN.  Jason’s interests include playing golf, spending time with his wife and eight year old daughter exploring the Coachella Valley. Contact Me Mitchell Putnam Membership Director Contact Me 832-810-5872 Mitchell.Putnam Contact Me About Mitchell + Close Mitchell Putnam information modal Mitchell Putnam Membership Director Serving since 2014 832-810-5872 Mitchell.Putnam 832-810-5872 Mitchell.Putnam Contact Me About Mitchell Email:  Mitchell.Putnam@clubcorp.comMitchell holds a BS degree in Criminal Justice from Sam Houston State University. He was born and raised in Houston Texas. He joined the Invited family as Service Captain at Willow Creek Golf Club in 2014, eventually becoming the Membership Director in 2017. He joined The Golf Trails of The Woodlands team in 2018 as the Membership Director. He enjoys playing golf, fishing, and watching Houston sports teams play. Contact Me Annemarie McKay Event Sales Director Contact Me 281-801-4103 Annemarie.Mckay Contact Me About Annemarie + Close Annemarie McKay information modal Annemarie McKay Event Sales Director Serving since 2015 281-801-4103 Annemarie.McKay 281-801-4103 Annemarie.McKay Contact Me About Annemarie Annemarie is originally from Allen, Tx. She holds a Bachelor’s degree in Hospitality Administration from Stephen F. Austin State University, located in the small town of Nacogdoches, Texas. Annemarie started her career with Invited as a college intern at Stonebriar Country Club in Frisco, Tx. After she graduated, she was hired on fulltime as their Private Event Coordinator assisting with corporate and social events. Annemarie then moved forward in here career and stepped into the role of Private Event Manager at the Las Colinas Country Club in Irving, Tx. There she continued to build her range of events and added Golf Tournaments to her portfolio. She had the privilege of working on events such as George W. Bush Presidential Center’s Warrior Open and the 2015 Volunteers of America North Texas LPGA Shootout. Annemarie recently moved to Houston to further pursue her passion for private events and is proud to call the Woodlands Country Club home, as their Private Event Director. Contact Me Brooke Tyler Event Sales Director Contact Me 281-339-8085 Brooke.Tyler Contact Me About Brooke + Close Brooke Tyler information modal Brooke Tyler Event Sales Director Serving since 2009 281-339-8085 Brooke.Tyler 281-339-8085 Brooke.Tyler Contact Me About Brooke Brooke Tyler is a graduate of The University of Texas at Arlington with a degree in Public Relations. She moved to the Houston Area in 2004 where she started her career in the hospitality industry. She worked for Marriott International for five years as an Event Manager planning various events ranging from corporate, social, to weddings. She began her career at The Woodlands Country Club in 2009 as an Event Manager where she planned Member Events, Member Association Events and Golf Tournaments. In 2012, she took over the Private Event Manager role where she focused on selling and executing all private events for The Woodlands Country Club. She has had the pleasure of working with many members, clients and brides to successfully implement their event. Some of her most favorite memories have been made at The Country Club. She has made some of her closest friendships while working here, as well as meeting her husband, Wes. Caloosa Greens Golf Club 2115 Caloosa Blvd , Sun City Center , Florida , 33573-5162 View as map Be the first to write a review Quick Facts Holes 18 Par 72 Length 6444 yards Slope 127 Rating 70.9 Year built: 1979 Architect(s): Ron Garl,Mark Mahannah Greens: Bermuda Grass Fairways: Bermuda Grass Season: Year round Nearby Tee Times Course Info Reviews Caloosa Greens Golf Club 2115 Caloosa Blvd , Sun City Center , Florida , 33573-5162 View as Map Be the first to write a review Holes 18 Par 72 Length 6444 yards Slope 127 Rating 70.9 Year built: 1979 Architect(s): Ron Garl,Mark Mahannah Greens: Bermuda Grass Fairways: Bermuda Grass Season: Year round Not far from Sun City Center, Caloosa Greens Golf Club offers terrific views and challenging play for golfers at every skill level. Well-groomed fairways and greens keep Caloosa Greens Golf Club difficult yet friendly, and the staff can offer tips and tricks for playing your best round. Caloosa Greens Golf Club is a terrific choice for your regular rounds of golf or a new destination for you and friends when visiting Sun City Center. more... Caloosa Golf & Country Club, Sun City Center, FL - Scorecard & Overview Join Now Log In Book a Tee Time Find a Course Learn Equipment Instruction Lifestyle Tour Golf Travel All Articles Resources Find Driving Ranges Find Golf Simulators About Us Find golf lessons Newsletter Join Now Log In Newsletter Search Courses Enter Keyword Home Courses FL Sun City Center Private 5 1 Review Caloosa Golf & Country Club Designed by Ron Garl and opened in 1979 Caloosa - Sun City Center , Florida Course Details Scorecard Flyover Views Yardage Maps Reviews Nearby Courses Course Details Holes: 18 Par: 72 Length: 6388 yards Slope: 123 Rating: 70.6 Driving Ranges: Yes The 18-hole "Caloosa" course at the Caloosa Golf & Country Club facility in Sun City Center , Florida features 6388 yards of golf from the longest tees for a par of 72. The course rating is 70.6 and it has a slope rating of 123. The estimated green fees for 18 holes is $55. Caloosa Golf & Country Club Golf Club has an onsite driving range with 6 practice tees. Designed by Ron Garl, the Caloosa golf course opened in  1979. Estimated Green Fees $55 These rates are an estimate of what you might expect to pay at Caloosa with a cart. Actual rates may vary. Fees are typically lowest Monday through Thursday and during twilight (late afternoon and evenings). Expect to pay the highest rates on weekends.
